{{ quote.id }} {{ quote.quote }} {{ quote.author}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { QuoteService } from 'src/app/services/quote.service'; import { Quote } from 'src/app/shared/models/Quotes'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quote-page', templateUrl: './quote-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quote-page.component.css'] }) export class QuotePageComponent implements OnInit{ quote!: Quote; constructor(private quoteService:QuoteService, private http: HttpClient){ } ngOnInit(){ this.quoteService.findAll().subscribe(data =>{ const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * data.length); this.quote = data[randomIndex]; }); } getQuoteUrl(): string { if (this.quote) { return `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/quotes/${this.quote.id}`; } return ''; } }
